name: Save The Dates
description: These awesome save the dates are designed for those who like elegant and minimalist designs. These come as a digital file customized to include your wedding colors, your photographs and your names. The design is available in both vertical (as shown) and horizontal layouts. These are designed to serve both as mailers for your email savvy friends and as a 5"x 7" printable cards for those who like to keep things traditional. Logo shown here will not be a part of design. If you want a certain font or style send me a mail at Pculiardesigns@gmail.com so that we can get you the card you want. If you are looking for wedding card designs please contact us as we believe in custom wedding cards only. For a quote of complete wedding design (including save the dates, wedding invite, Place cards, Gift Tags an banner) please send a mail on Pculiardesigns@gmail.com with your requirements so that we can send you a quote. All the designs are Digital files only. You will have to either get them printed or print them yourselves. This design is sold multiple times but customized on request so you can assume your card will look different. The design is meant only for personal use. Do not use it for commercial purposes.

name: Printable Holiday card with lights, Santa and his reindeer.
description:
This is a printable holiday card which can be used as a card, gift tag, wall decoration (as shown) or an email mailer. This is just a digital file and the frame shown is indicative. You will get an image at 300dpi to be printed on a 5"x7" card. Options Your size upto an A4- you will be sent a file in 300dpi resolution for the size you want upto A4 (8.5"x11") Customized Card- Get your or your business name on the card and have your own customized card.

Please send your desired text and font (should be a free font) to Pculiardesigns@gmail.com. If you do not send any font i will use the one I feel suits your company name and design.

name: Printable Toddler Birthday Invitation Card
description:
This is an invitation card for first few birthdays of your child. The card will carry your content and comes with or without the custom photograph(read terms). THIS IS A DIGITAL FILE DESIGN OPTIONS: with or without custom photo SIZE OPTIONS: The card is designed to be printed on A4 sheet and size options are: 4 cards on an A4 2 cards on an A4 A4 size card or mailer Specify the size required default size if not specified is half A4 which will print 2 on an A4. TURNAROUND TIME: 48 hours after you send complete info. In case you need an urgent delivery (24 hours or less buy the 1$ Urgent delivery.) HOW TO ORDER 1. Please purchase this listing by clicking "Add to Cart" above. 2. Email your preferred wording (or text) to pculiardesigns@gmail.com, along with the custom photo (if you selected this design option) 3. You will then receive an email within 24 hours with the image file at 600 dpi. TERMS
  1. This design can only be distributed for one-time personal use and is not to be resold.
  2. This is a digital file and no refund will be made. Please assure yourself before you buy the product
  3. The custom photo sent will be not be enhanced or edited. Ensure that the picture sent is at proper resolution. If you do not buy the custom photo there will not be any photo on the card

name: Premade Blogger Template-Pculiar Minimal
description:
This is a pre-made Minimalist blogger template.


The template is designed to keep focus on your awesome content and keep the hype at bay. The social media Icons are hidden and reveal themselves when your mouse hovers over it.

This template is for Blogger accounts ONLY

Why should you buy the template?
  1. It is an awesome and clean template.
  2. You want to keep focus on your content.
  3. It can be customized and you can do it easily with a bit of HTML on your side.
What all will you get?
Option 1- Template .xml file and the installation guide pdf
Option 2- Option1+ I will install your template and update all the links to your accounts, logo etc.
Option 3- Full package which means all the benefits of Option 2 plus you get it to look exactly as you want. Change colors change icons fonts and everything else you want. I will also install 5 widgets so that when I am done your blog works the way it should.

What all do you need if you want to install the template?
  1. A blogger account.
  2. The template and installation guide.
  3. A bit of patience while you navigate the code. (It is quite simple)
What will I require if you want me to install it?
  1. Access to your blogger account.
  2. Links to your social media pages and ids
What will I need if you want me to customize it?
  1. Both of the above.
  2. Links to the fonts and images you want to put in the template.
  3. Colors you want to use.
What you should be doing if you are not sure what you want?
  1. Buy only the template it is both cheap and the guide will get you through installation and basic customization.
  2. If you are confident you will face problem and are sure how you want the template to look buy the full option.

Have a great time blogging
